pkgmetadata.longdescription: Make Functions that Can Recurse Infinitely // Implements a trampoline algorithm for R that let's users write recursive functions that get around R's stack call limitations, enabling theoretically infinite recursion. The algorithm is based around generator function as implemented in the 'coro' package, and is based almost completely on the 'trampoline' module from Python https://gitlab.com/ferreum/trampoline.
